text: The Papal Navy (, "Pontifical Navy"; ) was the main navy of the Papal States from the Battle of Ostia (879) until the Fall of the Papal States in 1871. == Ships == * At Lepanto: ** Capitana ("flagship") ** Padrona ("squadron flagship") ** Suprema (Supreme) ** Serena (Serene) ** Pace (Peace) ** Vittoria (Victoria) ** Grifona (Gryphon) ** Santa Maria ** San Giovanni ** Regina (Queen) * San Bonaventura (St. Bonaventure)Laudonio, Marco. La Repubblica. "Arsenale Pontificio, la rinascita." Op. cit. Ordine degli Architetti di Roma e Provincia. Accessed 4 June 2010. * San Pietro, a schooner * , an earlier brig broken up in 1807 * Roma, a steamer * Immacolata Concezione (Immaculate Conception), a corvette == Gallery == == References == Category:840s establishments Category:1878 disestablishments Category:Disbanded navies
title: Papal Navy
